description:
*Exhibition Mode Users read Special Case below* 

This app launches the stock built in "Agenda App" that is usually hidden by default and only accessible through the "Exhibition Mode" App on your device or while using a Touchstone Charger.   


The Agenda App is a stock application that gives you a preview of your agenda for the day/calendar events along with the date and time.   

This app gives you access to the default Agenda App that is usually only found through exhibition mode.    


Note: (*Exhibition mode users*)  If you have the "Agenda" app as the last app being viewed inside exhibition mode you will need to change it (set it to be on "Time" view or another app) or simply turn off Agenda inside the exhibition mode app. This is only needed to be done if the Agenda App doesn't launch when using this app. If you do not use Exhibition mode you will not have a problem with the Agenda App Launching (*Exhibition mode users*)



Don't forget to check out my available apps for only $0.99 cents. 

My Apps:

Quick-Keys Keyboard 
Days To Come 
Days Gone By 
Days Till Christmas 
Days Till New Year


My Free Apps: 
Night Light Timer
webOS Launcher 

& Thanks for looking at my app.
